title: Bright Beyond, Episode 1
description: Two days before her twentieth birthday, Eva Braebel's life fell apart. She lost her friends, her love, and her future before being forced into medical stasis. She awakes in the midst of chaos and is thrown into a world much different than the one she remembers. Eva thought she already lost it all, but what if there's even more to lose?This is episode ONE of a multi-part novella serial.
author: Theresa Kay
